definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: This effect remains until the Pariahs are eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 直到贱民的这一个效果残余物被除去。

sentences.english: Serum sphingomyelin levels are related to the clearance of postprandial remnant-like particles.
sentences.chinese: 血清鞘磷脂水平与餐后残余物清除的相关性。

sentences.english: This kind of shampoo is used to remove the residue that builds up on hair.
sentences.chinese: 这种洗发精是用来清除累积在头发上的化学残余物。

sentences.english: Azoic rocks don't contain organic remains.
sentences.chinese: 无生代岩石中不包含有机残余物。

sentences.english: Residuals are room-temperature solids made up of molecules with 30 or more carbons.
sentences.chinese: 常温下为固体的残余物是由30或更多的碳组成。

sentences.english: Dried paint giblets can be wiped off by paint cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 干燥后的油漆残余物可用去漆水去除。

sentences.english: After maintenance the main remains and remainders are left on the domain.
sentences.chinese: 维修之后，重要遗骸和残余物留在拉领地上。

sentences.english: A pelagic sediment containing at least 30 per cent skeletal remains of microorganisms.
sentences.chinese: 一种含微体生物骨骼残余物至少30%的远洋沉积物。
